friends.title: Community
friends.no_friends: You haven't added any friends yet.

patch_notes.title: Version News
patch_notes.manual_add_feature: GeneralImplemented the Add Item Manually feature, allowing the creation of custom entries in any list without relying on API search. Manual items are fully editable.
patch_notes.edit_title_author_improvement: InterfaceAdded the ability to edit the title and author/publisher for items in all lists in the edit menu.
patch_notes.progress_input_improvement: ProgressFixed the 'Read' and 'Played' input for Books and Games that was not working correctly on the main list.
patch_notes.leading_zero_fix: InterfaceFixed a visual bug where the leading '0' did not disappear when focusing on progress fields.

history.title: Version History
history.manual_add_feature: GeneralImplemented the Add Item Manually feature, allowing the creation of custom entries in any list.
history.edit_title_author_improvement: InterfaceAdded the ability to edit the title and author/publisher for items in all lists.
history.progress_input_improvement: ProgressFixed the 'Read' and 'Played' input for Books and Games on the main list.
history.leading_zero_fix: InterfaceFixed a visual bug where the leading '0' did not disappear when focusing on progress fields.
history.friends_feature: SocialImplemented full Friends functionality (search, add, accept, and remove).
history.user_profile_feature: SocialThe old "Dashboard" was transformed into a full User Profile page.
history.share_stats_feature: SharingAdded an option on the profile to generate and share an image with statistics.
history.search_priority_fix: SearchAnime search was improved to prioritize results with the exact name.
history.status_sorting_fix: SortingSorting by status was fixed to follow the logical order.

settings.title: Settings - My List
settings.edit_profile_subtitle: Change your username and profile picture.
settings.username_placeholder: How would you like to be called?
settings.delete_list_subtitle: This action is irreversible. All items in all of your lists will be permanently deleted.
settings.delete_account_subtitle: This action is final and irreversible. All of your data will be permanently deleted.
settings.theme_subtitle: Choose between the light or dark theme for the application.
settings.accent_color_subtitle: Customize the main color for buttons and links.
settings.list_density_subtitle: Change the spacing of the items in your list.
settings.language_subtitle: Choose the display language for the application.
settings.export_subtitle: Export your list to a JSON file.
settings.import_subtitle: Import a backup file to restore your list. Warning: This will overwrite your current list.
settings.about_app_subtitle: An application to organize and track your favorite media.
settings.modal_delete_list_message: Warning: This action is irreversible and will delete all items from all of your lists. Do you wish to continue?
settings.modal_delete_list_success_message: All your lists have been deleted.
settings.modal_import_message: Warning: This will overwrite your current list.
settings.modal_delete_account_message: This is your last chance. Deleting your account will permanently remove all of your data.
settings.alert_reauth_message: For security, your browser will open for you to sign in again to confirm the deletion.
settings.alert_lang_change_message: The language has been updated. The page will reload to apply the changes.
